← prim.sh

What it costs to run prim.sh

Full cost transparency. Infrastructure costs are shared overhead; per-route provider costs live in each primitive's prim.yaml.

Infrastructure

ItemProviderMonthlyNotes
vpsdigitalocean$12.00s-1vcpu-2gb (2GB RAM, 1 vCPU, 50GB disk). Shared by all prims
domain_prim_shnamecheap$2.92prim.sh, $34.98/yr amortized. Order 195616489 (2026-02-25)
domain_primitiveshell_comnamecheap$0.96primitiveshell.com, $11.48/yr incl. ICANN. Order 195781641 (2026-02-27)
domain_primitiveshell_orgnamecheap$0.61primitiveshell.org, $7.28/yr incl. ICANN. Order 195781641 (2026-02-27)
x_premiumx$8.00@useprim marketing. Web pricing (switched from iOS $11/mo on 2026-02-28)
githubgithub$0.00Free plan. Downgraded from Team ($4/mo) on 2026-02-28 — public repo
cloudflarecloudflare$0.00Free plan — R2, DNS, Pages
Total fixed$24.49/mo

Risk flags

PrimitiveEndpointSeverityDescription
spawn.shPOST /v1/servershigh$0.01 one-time charge vs $4/mo DO droplet (-39,900% margin). Needs recurring billing model.
search.shPOST /v1/searchhighx402 price ($0.001) < provider cost ($0.005). -400% margin. Loss leader at beta pricing.
token.shPOST /v1/tokensmoderate90% margin at normal Base L2 gas (~$0.10). Mainnet congestion can push gas above $1. Needs gas oracle.
domain.shPOST /v1/domains/registermoderateDynamic pricing via Namecheap. Margin depends on TLD wholesale cost. No fixed margin guarantee.

Generated from docs/costs.yaml + prim.yaml files.
